transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Hi, is this Zhi? This is Arjun calling from MongoDB. Do you have a quick minute?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Hey, yes, this is Zhi from Acme Corp. Uh, what's this about?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Great, thanks, Zhi. I noticed Acme Corp. recently did a data compliance review. I wanted to ask—how is your current setup with Firebase handling those requirements?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Uh, we’re getting by. To be honest, there’ve been some gaps, especially around data residency and audit trails. But, yeah, we’re still figuring out what’s next.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Makes sense. That’s exactly where MongoDB Atlas can help, actually. We offer advanced controls for data sovereignty and full audit logging—across regions. Is strict compliance one of your priorities right now?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: It is, yeah, but… honestly, we’re pretty invested in Firebase. Moving sounds risky and expensive.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: I get that. Migrations always sound daunting. Just so you know, our team’s handled dozens for fintech firms, and we have tooling to reduce both data and downtime risk. The switch could be pretty smooth.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Okay, but I have to ask… what about ongoing costs? Firebase is, uh, predictable for us right now.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, that’s fair. Atlas has flexible pricing—you only pay for what you use. If you’d like, I can send over a tailored TCO comparison for Acme Corp. based on your current usage, so you’re not guessing.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: I’d look at that, but… performance is another thing we worry about. Lots of concurrent users, especially during market open. Firebase has handled spikes so far.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Absolutely, and Atlas is built for those surges. Global clusters, built-in auto-scaling, and proven throughput under heavy fintech loads—there are some big names using us for real-time trading data.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Alright, but, uh… we’ve also been burned by vendor lock-in before. How’s the flexibility?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: I totally hear you. MongoDB is open source at its core, so you’re never locked in. Atlas just adds managed services and compliance features on top—you always own your data.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: That’s good. Still, we have to be super careful—regulators are watching closely these days. How do you handle, like, SOC 2 and GDPR?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Great question. Atlas is certified for SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, PCI DSS, and more. We offer fine-grained RBAC and field-level encryption—so your auditors will have what they need.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Okay, you’ve given me a lot to think about, Arjun.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: No problem, Zhi. Would it make sense for us to set up a follow-up call—maybe next week? I can bring my solutions architect so we can dig into migration steps and compliance in detail.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, let’s do that. Can you send me an email, and I’ll loop in my CTO?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Absolutely. I’ll send a calendar invite with some times. Thanks a lot, Zhi.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Thank you, Arjun. Talk soon.
